mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.created_at, o.order_status, o.total_price, o.delivery_num, (SELECT product_name FROM order_item WHERE order_id = o.order_id AND ROWNUM = 1) AS rep_product_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_item WHERE order_id = o.order_id) AS total_item_count FROM ORDERS o WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT o.order_id, o.created_at, o.order_status, o.total_price, o.delivery_num, a.recipient, a.postal_code, a.address, a.detail_address, a.phone, p.card_company, p.card_number FROM ORDERS o JOIN address a ON o.address_id = a.address_id JOIN payment_methods p ON o.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT order_item_id, product_id, product_name, quantity, product_price, (product_price * quantity) AS total_amount FROM order_item WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
